overview:
A 15 year telecommunications veteran, Michael Tupper founded Tubaloo in November 2005 with a vision to integrate the various capabilities native on todayâ€™s smartphones â€“ including high speed data networking, GPS and location-based data, along with superior audio and video â€“ to deliver the ultimate communications experience.

Through identifying trends in the high-tech and telecommunications industries, often years before they hit mainstream consciousness, Michael has been able to harness this knowledge to provide the best analysis, counsel, design and implementation to each up-and-coming telecommunication project heâ€™s collaborated on.

Michaelâ€™s telecom management experience includes working with carriers around the world, most recently as vice president of carrier sales for Atlas Telecom Network. After Atlas, Mike led business development efforts for Latin American carriers for Terremark Worldwide, the IT infrastructure company that leverages connectivity from more than 160 carriers around the world. Mike left Terremark to co-found the mobile VoIP provider Community, where he served as its COO.

Michael holds a Bachelor of Arts in communications and marketing from The Evergreen State College in Olympia, Wash.
